title: Update hero background artwork (moon + waterfall + volcano + sun)

requirements.text: Generate a new hero background image depicting a moon scene with a waterfall on one side and a volcano with the sun on the other side, and add it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: of the moon and a waterfall on one side and a volcano with the sun on the other side

acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename specified in imageRequirements.required.
The image visually includes: (1) moon-themed side with a waterfall, (2) opposite side with a volcano and the sun.

requirements.text: Update the Hero section to use the newly generated background image instead of the current /assets/generated/anime-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png background.

quotes: of the moon and a waterfall on one side and a volcano with the sun on the other side

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx references the new generated image path in its backgroundImage style.
The hero remains full-screen with the background covering the section (no tiling) and the text remains readable with the existing overlay.

constraints: Do not modify files in frontend.immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/components/ui).
Do not route or fetch the hero background image through the backend; it must be served as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated.
nonGoals: Do not add email sending or real contact-message delivery functionality.
Do not change unrelated page sections (About, Characters, Worldbuilding, Episodes, Contact, Footer) beyond any necessary styling side-effects from the new hero background.

required: Epic anime-style landscape background with a moonlit waterfall scene on one side and a volcano with a bright sun on the other, blended into a single panoramic composition (anime-hero-bg-moon-waterfall-volcano-sun.dim_1920x1080.png)
